overview_of_class: This seminar is designed to build the teaching skills of graduate students as teaching assistants and as instructors of their own courses. To this end, course topics include creating inclusive classrooms, leading discussion groups, writing a teaching statement, constructing a syllabus, writing lectures, and interpreting course evaluations.
name: Seminar on College Teaching
title: WCAS SOCIOL 570-0-20 Seminar on College Teaching

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This seminar is designed to build the teaching skills of graduate students as teaching assistants and as instructors of their own courses. To this end, course topics include creating inclusive classrooms, leading discussion groups, writing a teaching statement, constructing a syllabus, writing lectures, and interpreting course evaluations.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value: All materials available on Canvas. No purchase necessary.

subject: SOCIOL
